{"step_by_step_thinking": "The maxillary first molar typically has three roots and three canals. The roots are known as the mesiobuccal, distobuccal, and palatal roots. The mesiobuccal root usually has two canals, while the distobuccal and palatal roots each have one canal. Therefore, the correct answer is A. 3 roots and 3 canals.", "answer_choice": "A"}
